TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextRange extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a selection of content between two positions.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>类引入了以下术语。
- **所选内容**-<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>是选择的内容所指示的两个位置之间**TextPointers**。 其中一种定位固定的定位点，根据所选内容，而另一个位置是可移动。 这是类似于通过使用鼠标或键盘的用户所做选择的行为方式。
- **当前所选内容**-因为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>始终指示所选内容在内容中，则最好仅仅是指由所选内容<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>作为*当前所选内容*。
- **文本容器**-*文本容器*窗体手头的流内容的最终边框的元素; 由所选内容<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>始终处于内的文本容器。 目前，文本容器必须是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。
- **文档**-包含的文本容器内的全部内容被称为*文档*。
有关其他详细信息相关这样的字词*位置*，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer>。
## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Text%2A>的属性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>返回指定的纯文本表示形式<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>。
[!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer position1, class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer position2) cil managed
Public Sub New (position1 As TextPointer, position2 As TextPointer)

Docs.param: A fixed anchor position that marks one end of the selection used to form the new .
A movable position that marks the other end of the selection used to form the new .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking two specified positions as the beginning and end positions for the new range.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 一个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>选择所指示的两个位置之间构成**TextPointers**。 这些位置之一 (为由`position1`) 固定的根据所选内容，而另一个位置 (由`position2`) 是可移动。 这是类似于通过使用鼠标或键盘的用户所做选择的行为方式。
新的实际端点<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>可能会进行调整以匹配适用于包含新的文档的任何内容选择试探<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>构造函数。
[!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]

Docs.exception: Occurs when and are not positioned within the same document.

Public Sub ApplyPropertyValue (formattingProperty As DependencyProperty, value As Object)

Docs.param: The value for the formatting property.
Docs.summary: Applies a specified formatting property and value to the current selection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法应用格式设置的方法是插入适当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline>元素，如<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold>并<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Italic>，指示此所选内容到<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearAllProperties() cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes all formatting properties (represented by elements) from the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只会影响任何<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Inline>格式的元素，如<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold>或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Italic>。 设置段落和其他封闭属性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Block>元素不会更改。

Docs.param: A position to test for inclusion in the current selection.
Docs.summary: Checks whether a position (specified by a ) is located within the current selection.
Docs.returns: if the specified position is located within the current selection; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在当前所选内容的任一端的位置 (由<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.End%2A>) 被认为是当前所选内容的一部分。
## Examples 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Contains%2A> 方法的用法。

Docs.exception: Occurs when *textPointer* is not in the same document as the current selection.

Docs.param: A formatting property to get the value of with respect to the current selection.
Docs.summary: Returns the effective value of a specified formatting property on the current selection.
Docs.returns: An object specifying the value of the specified formatting property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了返回属性值，则整个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>只有一个值的文本上，必须扩展`formattingProperty`。 如果<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>通过使用两个或多个不同值的文本进行了扩展`formattingProperty`，<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>返回。

Docs.exception: Occurs when does not specify a valid formatting property, or specifies an invalid value for .

public: property bool IsEmpty { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not the current selection is empty.
Docs.value: 如果当前所选内容为空;否则为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 一个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>被视为空，如果<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.End%2A>位置是否相等。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.IsEmpty%2A>属性。
[!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_loadsave)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_loadsave)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Load (System.IO.Stream stream, string dataFormat);
.method public hidebysig instance void Load(class System.IO.Stream stream, string dataFormat) cil managed
public: void Load(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::String ^ dataFormat);

Docs.param: A readable stream that contains data to load into the current selection.
A data format to load the data as. Currently supported data formats are , , , and .
Docs.summary: Loads the current selection in a specified data format from a specified stream.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>是`true`为`stream`，内容流开始加载到流的末尾。 否则，将从当前读取内容<xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A>到流的末尾。 此方法返回时，`stream`打开和中的当前位置处于`stream`是不确定的。
加载操作用新加载的内容替换当前所选内容。
## Examples 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Load%2A> 方法的用法。
[!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_loadsave)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_loadsave)]

Docs.exception: Occurs when the specified data format is unsupported. May also be raised if content loaded from does not match the specified data format.

Docs.summary: Saves the current selection to a specified stream in a specified data format.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Save (System.IO.Stream stream, string dataFormat);
.method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.Stream stream, string dataFormat) cil managed
public: void Save(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::String ^ dataFormat);

Docs.param: An empty, writable stream to save the current selection to.
A data format to save the current selection as. Currently supported data formats are , , , and .
Docs.summary: Saves the current selection to a specified stream in a specified data format.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法返回时，`stream`打开和中的当前位置处于`stream`是不确定的。
保存的一部分操作，当前所选内容中的内容可能会转换为指定的数据格式`dataFormat`。
## Examples 下面的示例演示 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Save%2A> 方法的用法。
[!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_loadsave)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_loadsave)]

Docs.exception: The specified data format is unsupported. -or Content loaded from does not match the specified data format.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Save (System.IO.Stream stream, string dataFormat, bool preserveTextElements);
.method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.Stream stream, string dataFormat, bool preserveTextElements) cil managed
public: void Save(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::String ^ dataFormat, bool preserveTextElements);
member this.Save : System.IO.Stream * string * bool -> unit

Docs.param: An empty, writable stream to save the current selection to.
A data format to save the current selection as. Currently supported data formats are , , , and .
Docs.summary: Saves the current selection to a specified stream in a specified data format, with the option of preserving custom objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当`preserveTextElements`是`false`的自定义<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>对象将保存为已知<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>类型。 例如，假设您创建一个自定义<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement>称为`Heading1`，后者又继承<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>。 当调用此方法替换`preserveTextElements`设置为`false`，`Heading1`转换为<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>时<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>保存。 当调用此方法替换`preserveTextElements`设置为`true`，`Heading1`没有要转换的情况下保存。 若要保留自定义文本元素`dataFormat`必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.DataFormats.Xaml?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

Docs.exception: Occurs when the specified data format is unsupported. May also be raised if content loaded from does not match the specified data format.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Select (System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer position1, System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer position2);
.method public hidebysig instance void Select(class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer position1, class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer position2) cil managed
Public Sub Select (position1 As TextPointer, position2 As TextPointer)

Docs.param: A fixed anchor position that marks one end of the updated selection.
A movable position that marks the other end of the updated selection.
Docs.summary: Updates the current selection, taking two positions to indicate the updated selection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 一个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>选择所指示的两个位置之间构成**TextPointers**。 这些位置之一 (为由`position1`) 固定的根据所选内容，而另一个位置 (由`position2`) 是可移动。 这是类似于通过使用鼠标或键盘的用户所做选择的行为方式。
新选择的实际端点可能会调整以匹配适用于包含新的当前所选内容的文档的任何选择试探法。

Docs.exception: Occurs when and are not positioned within the same document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the plain text contents of the current selection.
Docs.value: 包含当前所选内容的纯文本内容的字符串。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此属性来提取当前选定内容，而不考虑可能会显示任何格式设置中的纯文本内容。
新的换行符和分段符被视为相对于此属性的等效项。 任何类型的当前选定内容中的内容分隔符转换到新行时读取此属性。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Text%2A>属性。
[!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]
